title: How Does Nelson Alfonso Make Amazing Cigars?
itunes:title: How Does Nelson Alfonso Make Amazing Cigars?
description:
We all know how important tobacco is when it comes to making a cigar. This week we look at what makes Atabey, Byron and Bandolero amazing cigars as we sit down with Nelson Alfonso and delve into how it fits into the name Selected Tobacco.

In the first hour we will light up a cigar from the care package, Bandolero Traviesos as share the story of the mythical Bandolero.

In the second hour we fire up an Atabey and share the legend surrounding its name as we continue to talk with Nelson Alfonso.

Join us on The Cigar Authority, the most listened to cigar podcast in the world. We will have all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
